title: Chloe Dougherty Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Chloe Dougherty? Check out all of Chloe Dougherty's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogChloe Dougherty Email Marketing Specialist Chloe Dougherty Chloe is an Email Marketing Manager at Similarweb. She has a background in email and content marketing for SaaS and eCommerce companies. Her work has been featured at New York Advertising Week. Outside of work, she enjoys binging podcasts, reading short stories, and baking treats for her friends. Chloe earned a Bachelor’s degree in Literature and Creative Writing from Ramapo College of New Jersey and currently lives in Tel Aviv with her mischievous cat.wha Outside of work, she enjoys binging podcasts, reading short stories, and baking treats for her friends.
